#imports script, filename
from sys import argv
script, filename = argv

#sets txt to open filename
txt = open(filename)

#sets line to read txt
line = txt.read()

#sets ln to length of line
ln = len(line)

#sets first to first half of line
first = line[:ln/2]

#sets second to second half of line
second = line[ln/2:]

#sets second to reversed second
second = second[::-1]

#sets first to reversed first
first = first[::-1]

#sets middle to middle of line
middle = line[ln/2+1]

#if first and second are the same and line is the same as reversed line
if first == second and line == line[::-1]:
    print "Yes"
else:
    print "No"

#imports script, filename
from sys import argv
script, filename = argv

#sets txt to open filename
txt = open(filename)

#sets line to read txt
line = txt.read()

#sets ln to length of line
ln = len(line)

#sets first to first half of line
first = line[:ln/2]

#sets second to second half of line
second = line[ln/2+1:]

#sets second to reversed second
second = second[::-1]

#sets first to reversed first
first = first[::-1]

#sets middle to middle of line
middle = line[ln/2]

#if first and second are the same and line is the same as reversed line
if first == second and line == line[::-1]:
    print "Yes"
else:
    print "No"


def is_palindrome(line):
    #sets ln to length of line
    ln = len(line)

    #sets first to first half of line
    first = line[:ln/2]

    #sets second to second half of line
    second = line[ln/2+1:]

    #sets second to reversed second
    second = second[::-1]

    #sets first to reversed first
    first = first[::-1]

    #sets middle to middle of line
    middle = line[ln/2]

    #if first and second are the same and line is the same as reversed line
    if first == second and line == line[::-1]:
        return True
    else:
        return False

if __name__ == "__main__":
    #imports script, filename
    from sys import argv
    script, filename = argv
    
    #sets txt to open filename
    txt = open(filename)
    
    #sets line to read txt
    line = txt.read()
    
    print is_palindrome(line)
